Articles.Content:
Antares is a rocket for launch small payloads. It's used to launch Cygnus spacecraft to the iss. This is my replica

Antares:

![E4Jx0hn.png](http://i.imgur.com/E4Jx0hn.png)

Cygnus:

![75ODZvi.png](http://i.imgur.com/75ODZvi.png)

Castor 30:

![241bedO.png](http://i.imgur.com/241bedO.png)

Download: [http://www./download/p2vszqcv7qhby88/Antares+Cygnus.craft](http://www./download/p2vszqcv7qhby88/Antares+Cygnus.craft)

Instructions & Notes

The second stage SAS dosen't work very well. But it works.

The tanks on the Cygnus are zenon tanks. So the engine doesen't work. I recommend using infinity fuel.

The Cygnus has no SAS.

I will most likley make a new. And better one in the future.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-29T13:54:36Z" title="05/29/2015 01:54  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 29, 2015</time> by Lime**
I'm not a big fan of rockets (I like planes more, so if I want a challenge in space I use SSTOs), but I might acctually try this out. Nicely done!
Thanks also there is one thing to Note. The second stage SAS doesen't work very well. But it works
